actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize an exchange of lands in South Dakota and Colorado.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all Federal rights and interests in certain national forest lands in Summit County, Colorado, and Lawrence County, South Dakota, to the Homestake Mining Company of California in exchange for certain of its lands in Lawrence, Meade, and Pennington Counties, South Dakota. Directs the Secretary to convey to Summit County, Colorado, all Federal rights and interests in certain lands known as "Summit County Landfill," subject to specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an exchange of lands in South Dakota and Colorado.
